description: Printed plain weave with stems topped with blossoms. Vert. rpt. 35.5". Printed plain weave 100% wool. Floral. 1, 3-petal orange blossom atop center stem of a 3-stem plant. Wavy stripes in green, blue, terra cotta. 35 1/2" vet. rpt. Cedar/Terra Rosa
